description: HomeFragment.kt defines a fragment for an Android TV app using the Leanback library. It creates a UI with rows of cards including a special card for Dietary Preferences, and handles user interactions to navigate accordingly.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays a list of cards using Android's Leanback library, including handling user interaction for navigation.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of HomeFragment.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI and row setup after activity is created.

methods.name: setupUi
methods.description: Configures the fragment's UI properties such as title, colors, headers, and badge drawable.

methods.name: setupRows
methods.description: Creates and sets up rows of cards, including a special 'Dietary Preferences' card with click handling.
